text: James Isaac Neutron is the main character in the Nickelodeon show The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius. Jimmy Neutron lives in a house with his pet dog Goddard. Jimmy Neutron first appeared on the 1998 television pilot. == Other websites == * Jimmyâ€™s profile at Nick.com Category:Animated movie characters Category:Animated television characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1998 Category:The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
